author: agrohsje
body:
pythia 8 version, introduced new options to work with bb4l
The physics was tested in CMSSW 9_3_6. Please find the corresponding slides here:
https://indico.cern.ch/event/725198/contributions/3028945/attachments/1661027/2661217/agrohsje_wbwb_validation.pdf

Cheers, Alexander.
title: updated bb4l userhook, modified ev1 to be consistent with latest ...
